base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: All Fields - Windows Update Policies
template.template_md:
{% block content %}

Windows Update Policies

{% for item in data_sources.allFieldsWindowsUpdatePolicies %} {% endfor %}
id created_by created_time modified_by modified_time agent_id policy_id critical important moderate low other run_time_hour run_time_frequency run_time_days run_time_days[0] run_time_day reboot_after_install reprocess_failed_inherit reprocess_failed reprocess_failed_times email_if_fail
{{ item.id }} {{ item.created_by }} {{ item.created_time }} {{ item.modified_by }} {{ item.modified_time }} {{ item.agent_id }} {{ item.policy_id }} {{ item.critical }} {{ item.important }} {{ item.moderate }} {{ item.low }} {{ item.other }} {{ item.run_time_hour }} {{ item.run_time_frequency }} {{ item.run_time_days }} {{ item.run_time_days[0] }} {{ item.run_time_day }} {{ item.reboot_after_install }} {{ item.reprocess_failed_inherit }} {{ item.reprocess_failed }} {{ item.reprocess_failed_times }} {{ item.email_if_fail }}
{% endblock %}
